corpus.description: Texts from Nuclear Threat Initiative website, created by Center for Non-Proliferation Studies
corpus.name: NTI

sentence.text: The feeling of guilt persisted , so that when I reached the corner of Sloane Square , I jumped out of my car and ran across the road .
The feeling of gloom persisted as he bathed and dressed slowly , having particular difficulty with his socks .

Many of the methodological problems persist , but a number of new techniques and theoretical approaches have helped to advance our knowledge of the subject .
